name: Noxsoul.GitHub.io
body:
# Aaron Ureel (@noxsoul)
*Husband, Father, Application Developer and Technologist*

## Background
I have been a C# developer for years and simply looking to learn some other programming languages.  I am transitioning into the DevOps side of our team and looking to learn some new tricks.

### Upcoming Projects
- DevOps builds using node.js and the scripts in package.json
- Standards for DevOps workflows with multiple environments (I.e. RnD, UAT, QA, and Prod)
- Converting a dynamic plugin framework using Silverlight into HTML5 

### Current Projects
- SVN Migration to Git for all our current applications
- Training team on the use of Git (and its many advantages ;)
- Helper scripts for developer and test teams (using PowerShell, Python, and node.js)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
